name: Puff' N Go
description:
Game created for Ludum Dare #34

With the Themes: Two Button Controls, and Growing

Navigate your puffer fish through the obstacles. Collect sucker fish to increase the multiplier on your score, but watch out. The sucker fish will make it harder to swim.

Two button controls:
Swim: w, up
Puff: s, down

There may be some clipping with the embedded version of the file. The WebGL files are available for download below.
